function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of wastewater and effluent water with PEDV and MgV viruses","Impact":"Spread of viruses to other organisms and potential infection of humans and animals","Mitigation":"Implementation of appropriate treatment and disinfection protocols for effluent water","Technologies":"Advanced water treatment technologies such as UV disinfection, ozonation, and chlorination","People":"Public, workers in wastewater treatment plants, animals in the surrounding environment","Owner":"Public health authorities, wastewater treatment plant operators, environmental regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective concentration method leading to inaccurate virus detection","Impact":"Misinterpretation of virus presence in water samples, leading to inadequate response and control measures","Mitigation":"Regular validation and quality control of concentration methods, use of multiple detection methods for cross-validation","Technologies":"Advanced analytical techniques such as PCR, ELISA, and next-generation sequencing","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Laboratory managers, researchers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate safety measures during the concentration process leading to accidental exposure to viruses","Impact":"Risk of infection for laboratory personnel and workers, potential spread of viruses to the wider environment","Mitigation":"Implementation of personal protective equipment (PPE) protocols, training on safe handling of virus samples, and proper waste disposal procedures","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and waste treatment systems","People":"Laboratory personnel, workers in the wastewater treatment plant, public","Owner":"Laboratory managers, wastewater treatment plant operators, occupational health and safety authorities"}]}
